deviceFwVer.name: deviceFwVer
deviceFwVer.description: Firmware version of the product in major.minor form

deviceHwVer.name: deviceHwVer
deviceHwVer.description: Hardware version of the product in major.minor form

deviceTime.name: deviceTime
deviceTime.description: The current time as measured by the device. The time is specified as YYYYMMDDHHMM, where YYYY - four digits of the year MM - month (01 through 12) DD - day of month(01 through 31) HH - hours(00 through 23) MM - minutes(00 through 59)

deviceUpTime.name: deviceUpTime
deviceUpTime.description: The time when the device is intialized. The time is specified as YYYYMMDDHHMM, where YYYY - four digits of the year MM - month (01 through 12) DD - day of month(01 through 31) HH - hours(00 through 23) MM - minutes(00 through 59).

deviceIpAddress.name: deviceIpAddress
deviceIpAddress.description: This object returns the current IP address of the device when read and modifies the IP address to the new value when set.

deviceIpNetmask.name: deviceIpNetmask
deviceIpNetmask.description: This object returns the netmask of the interface when read and modifies the netmask when set.

deviceGwAddress.name: deviceGwAddress
deviceGwAddress.description: This object returns the default gateway address of the device when read and modifies the default gateway when set.

deviceHostAddress.name: deviceHostAddress
deviceHostAddress.description: This object has the host (TFTP) server ip address which is used for software upgrade.

deviceReset.name: deviceReset
deviceReset.description: Always returns '0' when read and resets the device when set with a nonzero value

vsarReset.name: vsarReset
vsarReset.description: Setting this object to 1 resets the VSAR chip and initializes the VSAR control structures by reading from NVRAM.

vsarConfigTable.name: vsarConfigTable
vsarConfigTable.description: This table contains a list of configuration entries which can be loaded to VSAR chip or store current configuration to non volatile memory.

vsarConfigEntry.name: vsarConfigEntry
vsarConfigEntry.description: This entry contains configurationType, action specifying load/ store.

vsarConfigIndex.name: vsarConfigIndex
vsarConfigIndex.description: The index which points to the different VSAR configurations.

vsarConfigType.name: vsarConfigType
vsarConfigType.description: Configuration type can specify NVRAM configuration, Flash configuration etc.

vsarConfigAction.name: vsarConfigAction
vsarConfigAction.description: This specifies the action to be peformed on the configuration entry. When set is given with 'load' as action the device is loaded with the specified configuration type. If a set is given with 'store' as action, current configuration of the device is stored in the specified configuartion type.

usedAtmStreamsNumber.name: usedAtmStreamsNumber
usedAtmStreamsNumber.description: Currently used number of total available Tranport streams. This includes active and inactive streams

activeAtmStreamsNumber.name: activeAtmStreamsNumber
activeAtmStreamsNumber.description: Active Number of Transport Streams running in the system

maxAtmStreamsNumber.name: maxAtmStreamsNumber
maxAtmStreamsNumber.description: Max number of available Transport Streams available in the system

usedAsiStreamsNumber.name: usedAsiStreamsNumber
usedAsiStreamsNumber.description: Currently used number of total available ASI Tranport streams. This includes active and inactive streams

activeAsiStreamsNumber.name: activeAsiStreamsNumber
activeAsiStreamsNumber.description: Active Number of ASI Transport Streams running in the system

maxAsiStreamsNumber.name: maxAsiStreamsNumber
maxAsiStreamsNumber.description: Max number of available ASI Transport Streams available in the system

usedProgsNumber.name: usedProgsNumber
usedProgsNumber.description: Currently used number of programs. This includes active and inactive programs

activeProgsNumber.name: activeProgsNumber
activeProgsNumber.description: Active number of programs running in the system

maxProgsNumber.name: maxProgsNumber
maxProgsNumber.description: Max number of programs available in the system

usedPidsNumber.name: usedPidsNumber
usedPidsNumber.description: Currently used number of total available PIDs. This includes active and inactive PIDs

activePidsNumber.name: activePidsNumber
activePidsNumber.description: Active number of PIDs running in the system

maxPidsNumber.name: maxPidsNumber
maxPidsNumber.description: Max number of available PIDs in the system

usedConnectionsNumber.name: usedConnectionsNumber
usedConnectionsNumber.description: Currently used number of total available connection objects.

maxConnectionsNumber.name: maxConnectionsNumber
maxConnectionsNumber.description: Max number of available connection objects.

cstrmAirTemp.name: cstrmAirTemp
cstrmAirTemp.description: The ambient temperature in degrees Centigrade at the center of the main logic board.

cstrmCoreRegTemp.name: cstrmCoreRegTemp
cstrmCoreRegTemp.description: The case temperature in degrees Centigrade of the Core 5 volt voltage regulator I.C.

cstrm3VRegTemp.name: cstrm3VRegTemp
cstrm3VRegTemp.description: The case temperature in degrees Centigrade of the 3.3 volt voltage regulator I.C.

cstrmHotICTemp.name: cstrmHotICTemp
cstrmHotICTemp.description: The case temperature in degrees Centigrade of the designated hottest I.C. on the main board.

cstrm5VCoreVoltage.name: cstrm5VCoreVoltage
cstrm5VCoreVoltage.description: The voltage in 1/100ths of a volt of the 5 volt core regulator.

cstrm3VCoreVoltage.name: cstrm3VCoreVoltage
cstrm3VCoreVoltage.description: The voltage in 1/100ths of a volt of the 3.3 volt core regulator.

cstrm3VIOVoltage.name: cstrm3VIOVoltage
cstrm3VIOVoltage.description: The voltage in 1/100ths of a volt of the 3.3 volt I/O regulator.

streamNextIndex.name: streamNextIndex
streamNextIndex.description: To create a new entry in streamTable, management station has to first get this object value. The value 0 indicates that no assigned values are available. After each retrieval operation from management stations, agent should modify this to next unassigned index.

streamTable.name: streamTable
streamTable.description: A list of stream entries. An entry specifies the stream type, name and direction. It doesn't included stream specific parameters.

streamEntry.name: streamEntry
streamEntry.description: An entry in the stream table. This entry is used to specify the stream type, stream direction and stream status.

streamIndex.name: streamIndex
streamIndex.description: A unique integer handle that identifies a stream.

ingressState.name: ingressState
ingressState.description: This object specifies the status of the stream in ingress direction. The ingressState can be set to only 'inactive' by the management station. It is automatically set to 'active' by the agent when a valid connection is established.

egressState.name: egressState
egressState.description: This object specifies the status of the stream in egress direction.

streamType.name: streamType
streamType.description: This object specifies the type of the stream.

streamName.name: streamName
streamName.description: This object specifies the name of the stream.

streamStatus.name: streamStatus
streamStatus.description: This object specifies the status of stream entry.

ingressStreamTable.name: ingressStreamTable
ingressStreamTable.description: This table contains ingress stream configuration parameters, one entry per streamTable for which streamDirection is ingress.

ingressStreamEntry.name: ingressStreamEntry
ingressStreamEntry.description: An ingress entry specifies the cell rate of the stream.

ingressStreamCellRate.name: ingressStreamCellRate
ingressStreamCellRate.description: Specifies the cellrate of the ingress stream.

egressStreamTable.name: egressStreamTable
egressStreamTable.description: This table contains egress stream configuration parameters, one entry per streamTable for which streamDirection is egress.

egressStreamEntry.name: egressStreamEntry
egressStreamEntry.description: An egress entry specifies the transport stream rate, buffer control parameters, elasticity table parameters, divisor for center rate of elasticity window.

egressStreamTsRate.name: egressStreamTsRate
egressStreamTsRate.description: Transport rate for this egress stream.

egressStreamNumBufs.name: egressStreamNumBufs
egressStreamNumBufs.description: Number of buffers to be allocated for this egress stream. Setting this '0' to will deallocate the memory. Modify this value to change the number of buffers from current value.

egressStreamBufThreshold.name: egressStreamBufThreshold
egressStreamBufThreshold.description: Specifies the uniform dealy threshold for this egress stream.

egressStreamBufSize.name: egressStreamBufSize
egressStreamBufSize.description: Size of each buffer allocated in egress pool.

egressStreamJitter.name: egressStreamJitter
egressStreamJitter.description: Enable/disable Jitter Attenuation for this egress stream.

atmStreamTable.name: atmStreamTable
atmStreamTable.description: This table contains ATM stream configuration parameters, one entry per streamTable for which streamType is ATM.

atmStreamEntry.name: atmStreamEntry
atmStreamEntry.description: An ATM Transport Stream entry contains vpi and vci

atmStreamVpi.name: atmStreamVpi
atmStreamVpi.description: VPI associated with the ATM Stream

asiStreamTable.name: asiStreamTable
asiStreamTable.description: This table contians ASI stream configuration parameters, one entry per streamTable for which streamType is ASI.

asiStreamEntry.name: asiStreamEntry
asiStreamEntry.description: An ASI Transport stream entry specifies the port number.

asiStreamPort.name: asiStreamPort
asiStreamPort.description: Physical port number of the ASI stream.

asiStreamChannel.name: asiStreamChannel
asiStreamChannel.description: Channel associated with this ASI stream.

progNextTable.name: progNextTable
progNextTable.description: To create a new entry in progTable, management station has to first get next program index.

progNextEntry.name: progNextEntry
progNextEntry.description: This entry contains next program index that can by used by the management stations to add a program in a stream.

progNextIndex.name: progNextIndex
progNextIndex.description: Returns an index that can be associated with the given stream. The value '0' indicates that no assigned values are available. After each retrieval operation from management station, agent should modify this to next unassigned index.

progTable.name: progTable
progTable.description: A list of programs linked to one VCB. The number of entries is given by numProgs.

progEntry.name: progEntry
progEntry.description: progEntry contains program number, program name, TS rate, TS len.

progIndex.name: progIndex
progIndex.description: A unique handle which identies a program.

progNumber.name: progNumber
progNumber.description: Program number which identifies a program in a VCB.

progName.name: progName
progName.description: Human readable program name corresponding to the program number of this entry.

progTsRate.name: progTsRate
progTsRate.description: Aggregate tranport rate of the program.

progTsLen.name: progTsLen
progTsLen.description: Length of the transport stream packet.

progStatus.name: progStatus
progStatus.description: Status of this program associated with the VCB.

pidNextTable.name: pidNextTable
pidNextTable.description: To create a new entry pidTable, management stations has to first retrieve a next available pid index.

pidNextEntry.name: pidNextEntry
pidNextEntry.description: This entry contains next pid index that can by used by the mangement stations to add a pid to the given stream and program.

pidNextIndex.name: pidNextIndex
pidNextIndex.description: Returns an index that can be associated with the given stream and program. The value '0' indicates taht no assigned values are available. After each retrieval operation from management station, agent should modify this to next unassigned index.

pidTable.name: pidTable
pidTable.description: List of pids linked to one program. The number of entries is given by numPIDs.

pidEntry.name: pidEntry
pidEntry.description: pidEntry contains pid number, remap pid number, table identifier, pid transport rate.

pidIndex.name: pidIndex
pidIndex.description: A unique integer pid Handle identifying a PID.

pidNumber.name: pidNumber
pidNumber.description: pid number which uniquely identifies a PID in a program.

pidTableID.name: pidTableID
pidTableID.description: table type identifier of this PID. This is 0 - Program Association Table 1 - Program MAP Table 2 - PCR PID >2 - Check the manual.

pidRate.name: pidRate
pidRate.description: Tranport rate of a specific PID.

cstrmConnNextIndex.name: cstrmConnNextIndex
cstrmConnNextIndex.description: Returns the next free Index in the connection table.

cstrmConnEntry.name: cstrmConnEntry
cstrmConnEntry.description: An cstrmConnEntry contains source program, source pid, dest program dest pid and asiStreamIndex values. This is the entry through which management station connect source programs to destination programs.

cstrmConnIndex.name: cstrmConnIndex
cstrmConnIndex.description: Index to identify a Connection Table.

ingressProgIndex.name: ingressProgIndex
ingressProgIndex.description: Source program number associated with the connection table. Source program number is linked to an ingress stream. A value of 'zero' indicates that all programs in the parent stream are connected to the egress stream.

ingressPidIndex.name: ingressPidIndex
ingressPidIndex.description: Source PID number associated with the connection table. Source PID number is linked to an ingress stream. A value of 'zero' indicates that all pids in the parent program are connected to the egress stream.

egressProgNum.name: egressProgNum
egressProgNum.description: Destination program number associated with the connection table. Destination program number is linked to an egress stream.

egressPidNum.name: egressPidNum
egressPidNum.description: Destination PID number associated with the connection table. Destination PID number is linked to an egress stream.

pcrAdjust.name: pcrAdjust
pcrAdjust.description: Enable/Disable PCR Time Stamp Adjustment for this connection.

cstrmConnStatus.name: cstrmConnStatus
cstrmConnStatus.description: Status of the this connection table.

connectionStreamTable.name: connectionStreamTable
connectionStreamTable.description: Connection Stream table is used to traverse the stream connections.

connectionStreamEntry.name: connectionStreamEntry
connectionStreamEntry.description: This entry has the connection index for the associated stream. If the ConnectionIndex is zero, connectionStreamIndex will return first connection object for this association.

connectionStreamIndex.name: connectionStreamIndex
connectionStreamIndex.description: Returns an active connection object index connected to/from the given stream index.

connectionProgTable.name: connectionProgTable
connectionProgTable.description: Connection Prog table is used to traverse the program connections.

connectionProgEntry.name: connectionProgEntry
connectionProgEntry.description: This entry has the connection index for the given program in the specified stream object. If the ConnectionIndex is zero, connectionProgIndex will return first conneciton object for this association.

connectionProgIndex.name: connectionProgIndex
connectionProgIndex.description: Returns an active connection object index connected to/from the given program index.

connectionPidTable.name: connectionPidTable
connectionPidTable.description: Connection pid table is used to traverse the pid connections.

connectionPidEntry.name: connectionPidEntry
connectionPidEntry.description: This entry has the connection index for the given pid in the specified program & stream object. If the ConnectionIndex is zero, connectionPidIndex will return first connection object for this association.

connectionPidIndex.name: connectionPidIndex
connectionPidIndex.description: Returns an active connection object index connected to/from the given pid index.

cstrmOverTemp.name: cstrmOverTemp
cstrmOverTemp.description: A cstrmOverTemp trap signifies that one or more of the temperature sensors has exceeded its high threshhold level. The values of the 4 temperature sensors are sent in Degrees Celsius with the trap.

cstrmCoolFail.name: cstrmCoolFail
cstrmCoolFail.description: A cstrmCoolFail trap signifies that a cooling system failure has occured.

cstrmPowerMonitor.name: cstrmPowerMonitor
cstrmPowerMonitor.description: A cstrmPowerMonitor trap signifies that one or more of the voltage sensors is out of acceptable range. The values of the 3 voltage sensors are sent in 100ths of milivolts.

cstrmActDeActTrap.name: cstrmActDeActTrap
cstrmActDeActTrap.description: This Trap is generated for each of Activate and Deactivate event Alarm.

cstrmIngressPidsChangedTrap.name: cstrmIngressPidsChangedTrap
cstrmIngressPidsChangedTrap.description: This Trap is generated for each of Activate and Deactivate event Alarm.
